column4: hello i've a problem: i have a cable input (from an microphone) and an cable output to my boxes. but i can't hear anything. how can i connect input and output. this problem appears only with 8.10 inpedix, not with hardy

hello i've a problem: i have a cable input (from an microphone) and an cable output to my boxes. but i can't hear anything. how can i connect input and output. this problem appears only with 8.10 inpedix, not with hardy
sure the mic is enabled in the mixer panel?
do you see a speaker in the upper right corner?
